tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage
type: Tutorial Step - Is That Good Enough?

definition.text: This seems to work well for the reversals of February 25th and April 1st, right?

paragraphs.text: Pan the chart to the right and check the period between May 24th and July 16th!
The market is clearly moving sideways in a narrowing range, and the indicator switches back and forth between Up and Down directions erratically.
This is not the ultimate solution to determine the trend!
